classes.description: Help with alerts for Bluemix applications
classes.confirmprompt: Would you like help with alerts for Bluemix applications (yes or no)?
texts: Can you help me with app alerts?
How can I be notified about application events.
How can I learn about applications with problems.

classes.description: Show Bluemix applications with problems over a time period
classes.confirmprompt: Would you like to see the Bluemix applications with problems for ${timeframe} (yes or no)?

Do I have applications with high Memory recently?

parameters.prompt: OK. What is the timeframe do you want to see problems for *today* or *this week*?
